stdout:
Table	Create Table
crmMergeJobs	CREATE TABLE `crmMergeJobs` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','processing','completed','failed','cancelled') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `totalRows` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `processedRows` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `validRows` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `invalidRows` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `originalFileKey` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `originalFileUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `enrichedFileKeys` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `enrichedFileUrls` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `outputFileKey` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `outputFileUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `config` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `errorMessage` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `startedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `completedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
